meanings.definition: The quality of being suitable for consumption as food.
meanings.sent1: The edibleness of the apple made it a perfect snack.
meanings.sent2: The chef always checks the edibleness of the ingredients before cooking.
meanings.sent3: The debate about the edibleness of the strange-looking fruit was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The edibleness of the dish was like a beacon of hope in the sea of bland food.
meanings.sent5: The edibleness of the cake was so irresistible that everyone wanted a slice.

meanings.definition: The state of being fit to be eaten.
meanings.sent1: The edibleness of the vegetables was evident from their fresh appearance.
meanings.sent2: Before serving, the chef always ensures the edibleness of the meal.
meanings.sent3: The discussion on the edibleness of the expired milk turned into a funny anecdote.
meanings.sent4: The edibleness of the fish was so perfect, it felt like a gift from the sea.
meanings.sent5: The edibleness of the berries was so inviting that even the birds couldn't resist.
